info:
This site, as is, is used to prototype animations, plotter drawings and other kind of print works. The main purpose is to have a tool for beginning faster a project, even is a project does not go beyond this website stage, the idea behind it had a trial.

Here is dropped some creative code, a way for me to skip my problems, a cool method to learn and progress with math.

Most of projects deal with randomness, generative design, loop and infinity.
title: Artemg.com
